comment: The "fundamental theorem of cyclic groups". Cyclic groups are exactly the additive groups ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , for ` 0 <_ n ` (where ` n = 0 ` is the infinite cyclic group ` ZZ ` ), up to isomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
